name: Jungle Escape (Hamza_G)
description:
... is a game in which you help a  Caveman find a nice home, far  away from all the jungle dangers.  But in order to escape he will need  to seek help from the greedy  monkey tribe. 
Features;  - Plant Enemies - Traps - Swinging Ropes - Collectables - Moving Platforms - Power Ups  CONTROLS: (controller support) - Move - A + D / Left Stick  - Jump - Space Bar / Button South - Interact - E / Button West - PauseMenu - Escape / Select Sounds by; Epidemic Sounds / We Love Indies  / Tyler Cunningham
